name: raining-in
displayName: RAINING IN V S C O D E
description: Relaxing downpour right in your editor
author: Tor Shepherd

commands.title: RAINING IN V S C O D E: Enable Downpour
RAINING IN V S C O D E: Disable Downpour

configuration.title: RAINING IN V S C O D E

rainingin.foregroundOpacity.description: Set the foreground opacity for the raindrop effect. Set this to the highest value you can see the raindrops.

rainingin.raindrop.color.description: Set the raindrop color for the rain effect.

rainingin.raindrop.minOpacity.description: Set the raindrop minOpacity value for the rain effect. 0.0 is invisible, 1.0 is opaque.

rainingin.raindrop.maxOpacity.description: Set the raindrop maxOpacity value for the rain effect. 0.0 is invisible, 1.0 is opaque.

rainingin.raindrop.count.description: Set the raindrop count value for the rain effect. 0 is none, 100 is 100 drops rendered (for example).

rainingin.raindrop.minSpeed.description: Set the raindrop minSpeed value for the rain effect in px/s.

rainingin.raindrop.maxSpeed.description: Set the raindrop maxSpeed value for the rain effect in px/s.

rainingin.raindrop.minDelay.description: Set the raindrop minDelay value for the rain effect. 0.0 is synchronized, 1.0 is average 1 second delay.

rainingin.raindrop.maxDelay.description: Set the raindrop maxDelay value for the rain effect. 0.0 is synchronized, 1.0 is average 1 second delay.

rainingin.raindrop.minAngle.description: Set the raindrop minAngle value for the rain effect. 0.0 is vertical, 90.0 is horizontal.

rainingin.raindrop.maxAngle.description: Set the raindrop maxAngle value for the rain effect. 0.0 is vertical, 90.0 is horizontal.

rainingin.raindrop.minSize.description: Set the raindrop minSize value for the rain effect, in how many pixels wide the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindrop.maxSize.description: Set the raindrop maxSize value for the rain effect, in how many pixels wide the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindrop.minLength.description: Set the raindrop minLength value for the rain effect, in how many pixels long the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindrop.maxLength.description: Set the raindrop maxLength value for the rain effect, in how many pixels long the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindrop.minFallHeight.description: Set the raindrop minFallHeight value for the rain effect, in how many pixels from the top the raindrops will fall.

rainingin.raindrop.maxFallHeight.description: Set the raindrop maxFallHeight value for the rain effect, in how many pixels from the top the raindrops will fall.

rainingin.window.width.description: Set the window width for the rain effect. Default = 3840 (4k).

rainingin.autoreload.description: Reload the window automatically on enable/disable.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
